H0.text: The Sun would appear larger and brighter to an astronaut on Pluto compared with how it looks from Earth.

H1.text: The Sun would appear smaller and brighter to an astronaut on Pluto compared with how it looks from Earth.

H2.text: The Sun would appear larger and dimmer to an astronaut on Pluto compared with how it looks from Earth.

H3.text: The Sun would appear smaller and dimmer to an astronaut on Pluto compared with how it looks from Earth.

A4.text: The angular diameter of the Sun decreases with increasing distance from the Sun.

A5.text: Flux decreases with distance according to an inverse-square law
